dcterms:creator: X. Che
C. Wang
H. Yang
C. Meinel
dcterms:description: The IWSLT TED Talk dataset is commonly used for punctuation restoration tasks, consisting of 2.1M words in the training set, 295k words in the validation set, and 12.6k words in the test set. Each word is labeled by one of four classes: O (No Punctuation), COMMA, PERIOD, and QUESTION.
dcterms:title: IWSLT2011
